  proposition: CoBEVT provides cooperative bird's eye view semantic segmentation with sparse transformers
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CoBEVT|CAPABILITY|cooperative bird's eye view semantic segmentation

    (no explicit relationships)

    entity-attribute relationships:

  proposition: V2XP-ASG focuses on generating adversarial scenes for vehicle-to-everything perception
    entity-attribute relationships:

    V2XP-ASG|DOMAIN|vehicle-to-everything perception

    entity-entity relationships:
    (no explicit relationships)

  proposition: V2X-DGW addresses domain generalization for multi-agent perception under adverse weather conditions
    entity-attribute relationships:
    V2X-DGW|CAPABILITY|domain generalization
    V2X-DGW|DOMAIN|multi-agent perception
    V2X-DGW|CONDITION|adverse weather
